body.name: Voyager Toddler Milk On The Go, USDA Organic Shelf Stable Whole Milk Powder, Great for Travel, No Refrigeration, Gluten Free with No GMO's and No Antibiotics for Kids, 16 Sachets of 15g

climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: 🍼TODDLER MILK, SIMPLIFIED: Say goodbye to bulky coolers and ice packs with our convenient, organic, powder milk sachets. They’re perfect for travel, picnics, camping, theme parks, beach or anything on the go! We use the highest quality ingredients, to ensure a delicious taste kids love to drink. TSA approved for hassle-free travel.

👩‍⚕️TRUSTED BY PEDIATRICIANS & PARENTS: Voyager Milk is backed and developed based on guidance from the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) and is the go-to milk powder for parents everywhere! Pediatricians love these shelf stable sachets because they create a delicious and nutritious drink with only three simple and transparent ingredients: organic whole milk, organic vitamin D & calcium.

🧊NO REFRIGERATION NEEDED: Voyager Milk sachets are organic, shelf stable, single-serve, and ready to go. Simply add our dry milk powder to 4fl oz. of water, shake and serve. Voyager is quick & convenient for parents of toddlers that are always on the go!

🌱NATURES GOODNESS: The shelf stable milk sachets contain no GMO's, no corn syrup, no added sugar, no palm oil, no antibiotics, and are 100% gluten-free. Our powdered milk sachets are pure and nutritious. Perfect for parents looking for a healthy, organic whole milk powder that leaves out all the extra filler.

🐄GRASS-FED COWS: Voyager Milk is sourced from 100% Grass-Fed, Pasture-Raised cows, from Family Farms in California. Our milk is certified USDA Organic, Kosher, Halal, Non-GMO and contains no palm oil, no corn syrup, no added sugar, no antibiotics and no gluten.

🥛NUTRITIOUS & HEALTHY: Created with toddlers in mind, these shelf stable whole milk powder sachets quickly make a nutritious drink that contains 4g of protein per serving, 180mg of calcium and 1.25 mcg of Vitamin D. These sachets only contain organic whole milk, organic vitamin D and calcium so your toddler kids can enjoy them worry-free! TSA approved!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Voyager English: [ voi-uh-jer ] noun, one who travels. French: [voi-ah-jay] verb, to travel. Voyager, meaning to travel in French, embodies our quest to create a high quality and expertly crafted toddler milk that builds on our European heritage. Inspired by the milk that my family enjoyed in Switzerland, we are proud to bring the same quality and craftsmanship, delivered in a convenient on-the-go format, made in the United States. Whether it is a trip to the neighborhood playground, visiting family or departing on a far-away adventure, we hope to make voyages easier for you and your little explorers.

Voyager: Pure, Portable and Nutritious Toddler Milk Voyager Milk is conveniently packaged in single-serve sachets so you can bring as much organic milk as needed for your toddler, without worrying about carrying liquid milk or finding milk at your destination. A premium toddler milk: No Refrigeration Required. Single serve sachets mean no cooler or ice packNo Bad Stuff. No palm oil, no corn syrup, no antibiotics, no added sugarDeveloped with Pediatricians. Formulated to support toddler growth

Few Ingredients At Voyager, we believe in simple and transparent foods. Less is more. That’s why our product consists of only 3 ingredients: organic whole milk, calcium and organic vitamin D. Nothing more, nothing less. Even while on-the-go, you can be confident that your toddler is drinking fresh and creamy organic whole milk, without palm oil, corn syrup, antibiotics, maltodextrin, gluten, GMO’s and no added sugar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and Shelf Stable!
reviews.reviewText: This has been a great addition to our travels with a milk-obsessed toddler through Asia. We often found that we couldn't find milk when we needed it or that what we found tasted a bit strange, had been sweetened, etc... Note: this does take a few minutes to truly dissolve, so shake well and wait a bit before serving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler loves this!
reviews.reviewText: We stumbled upon this through a friend’s referral. We were looking for something that was nutritious, convenient, and something our tot would enjoy (we have a picky eater) and so we’re so glad we purchased! it’s especially great because we’re always on the go in NYC and it’s a pain to carry around so much on the trains so we like how compact it is! Will be purchasing again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life saver on long trip!
reviews.reviewText: How did it take me so long to find these? Brought a pack on a trip to SE Asia and wish we’d brought like 4, we had a ratio our pouches my kid loved them so much. Great for the airplane and long car rides and times when our one year old melted down and just wanted food he was familiar with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Its good SOS but i think it doesnt taste the same as fresh milk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love being able to take these on the go! Delicious and convenient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One thing traveling with a toddler that's actually easy
reviews.reviewText: I don't often write reviews for things except this product is a game changer for us. My son is a big milk drinker but long car trips, plane rides, even days out and about it was always annoying to have to find milk and keep it cold etc. These are super easy and lightweight to carry instead of a bunch of stuff in a cooler. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved this product. Used it on a recent cruise with our 14mo old. The crusie offered milk but only at breakfast and when we asked so this was good for our in the go excursions and when we were in our room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t taste like milk
reviews.reviewText: Taste like a bad protein shake not giving it to my grandson
